column4: my guess is cdrecord got replaced by wodim, but wodim is backwards compatible.
therefore any software trying to use cdrecord will still work
wodim is a fork of cdrecord
lol, thought you were the one confused. :P
seemingly cdrecord author has changed license and tried to get money/licensing on cdrecord-prodvd etc.
and wodim is a fork from 'before license changing'
much like,  X.org is a fork, from before XFree86 changed license
